string.name: moveToStart
string.comment:
moveToStart
Move is a verb here. When the player moves a piece, the Puzzle Storm session begins.

resources.string: 今日のハイスコア更新！
今週のハイスコア更新！
今月のハイスコア更新！
歴代のハイスコア更新！

plurals.name: xRuns
plurals.comment:
xRuns [one] [other]
A run is an attempt/playthrough/session of Puzzle Storm.

plurals.name: playedNbRunsOfPuzzleStorm
plurals.comment:
playedNbRunsOfPuzzleStorm [one] [other]
This only refers to Puzzle Storm.
A run is an attempt/playthrough/session of Puzzle Storm.
